channel.title: Church Doors
channel.description:
currently i am involved in a project, that is to replace a church front door. i am looking for a ordaniry church door and can any of you know where i can buy one. i have looked it up online and found only few. if any of you can telll me where i can buy a church door it be great full. btw i am looking to minimize cost and looking at used doors too.
Thank you!

item.title: Church Doors
item.dc:creator: @Java_Ownz_U Java Ownz U
item.description:
@Java_Ownz_U wrote:

[quote=“SETO, post:17, topic:265291”]so far i got a door that is originally $ 13,000. but selling it for $8000 now. but i need to have more alternative options so my client can chose. plus i have to basically write a report on each door that i state. why it is good and why its bad. and finally tell the client which door is the best suitable for their church, and why it is better than the others.

this is that door for 8g

[quote author=goatee link=topic=350238.msg2691561#msg2691561 date=1236010585]
Go ask your precious God for one!
[/quote] lol i’m not a catholic, christian or w/e. this is just a project i’m doing for a client.[/quote]

Lol… ? How old are you… ? What do you do… ? And sorry but why the fuck are you asking these people for ideas. If your someone with clients that handles shit like that its pretty weird for you to be asking for ideas from a forum full of 7 - 19 yr olds that don’t know shit. (Obviously there are older people here that may know stuff but for this specific stuff its weird to ask here)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

yea, i have to get a custom made one, since there are few problems with the church’s constructions plans

item.title: Church Doors
item.dc:creator: @srt8 srt8
item.description:
@srt8 wrote:

The door for 8000 is really pretty.

Haha, but those are some pretty big doors. Our church just has regular ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Church Doors
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Haha wow, I don’t think even moparscape has doors that big…

You should contact a building company (maybe one that has built large churches?) and ask them about it. Even that might be difficult, because most doors that size are probably several hundred years old.

Read full topic

item.title: Church Doors
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

so far i got a door that is originally $ 13,000. but selling it for $8000 now. but i need to have more alternative options so my client can chose. plus i have to basically write a report on each door that i state. why it is good and why its bad. and finally tell the client which door is the best suitable for their church, and why it is better than the others.

this is that door for 8g

[quote=“goatee, post:9, topic:265291”]Go ask your precious God for one![/quote] lol i’m not a catholic, christian or w/e. this is just a project i’m doing for a client.
